title: What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing snow in a dream?

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing snow in a dream is one of the recurring visions of many people and the interpretation in general is not the same because it varies from one interpreter to another based on the factors he relies on to determine what a dream brings about evil or good, and today through the website on the secrets of dream interpretation we will deal with the interpretation of the dream in detail. Interpretation of seeing snow in a dream: Seeing snow in a dream indicates the blessing and goodness that will come in the dreamer’s life. Snow is a symbol of calm and stability. Whoever dreams that snow is blocking his path indicates that in the coming days he will stumble and face many obstacles and obstacles throughout his life, but God Almighty God Almighty will give him sufficient strength and wisdom to face it. Snow falling on the dreamer's head symbolizes illness and exposure to pain that cannot be relieved by the strongest types of painkillers. Heavy snowfall in the city where the dreamer lives is a sign that the residents of that city will be exposed to a major disaster or war in which there will be many victims. As for those who worked in the field of agriculture, snow falling on the ground is a sign of losing the crop and spoiling one’s life. Heavy snow falling in a dream indicates exposure to a financial disaster and thus exposure to extreme poverty. Ibn Shaheen believes that seeing snow does not in all cases portend tragedies, as it usually indicates the benefits that will prevail in life in addition to the death of worries, problems, and any difficult period. Interpretation of seeing snow in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Snow falling from the sky in a dream, as Ibn Sirin said, indicates a change. In conditions for the better, and thus, whoever suffered from drought and poverty, the dream heralds that he will leave this period and open the door to lawful livelihood before him. The dreamer is difficult. Snow falling in the dream indicates the safe return of the traveler. Snow in its season at that time is a sign of receiving a lot of goodness and omens that will improve the dreamer’s life for the better. Whoever dreams of snow falling from time to time suggests exposure to poverty and injustice, so he will strive for the rest of his life to change this situation. Heavy and rough snow falling indicates exposure to a harsh life in which the viewer suffers from all kinds of injustice and feels alone and with no one to support him. Seeing snow in a dream Wasim Yousef’s vision Snow in a dream, as Waseem Youssef explained, means that the dreamer’s life will be granted stability by God Almighty and remove all difficulties. Overall, the vision achieved many commendable results. White snow in a patient’s dream is good news about his recovery from diseases and the enjoyment of health, well-being and longevity. The snow that falls a lot in the dream, and it was soft and not hard, indicates the achievement of many goals, as the dreamer will reap the fruits of his efforts in the recent period and suggests that he will obtain a lot Of good news that satisfies the heart and soul, answers with prayer. The falling and accumulating snow on the road on which the dreamer is walking symbolizes the unhappiness and hardships that he will face in his life and it will be difficult to achieve any of his goals of freedom. Anyone who dreams of snow falling outside the season

title: Seeing fish in a dream for a married man

preview.html: Aside from some other variables that differ from one vision to another, as the article website mqaall.com will explain in detail. Seeing fish in a dream for a married man: A married man eating fish expresses this man’s effort to earn lawful money, which he spends on his family. Fishing indicates achieving a lot. Of profits and gains in the field of work in which this person works. If he eats fish with his wife in a dream, it is a harbinger of his wife’s imminent pregnancy and the birth of her male child, God willing. If this man has many enemies, then his large catch of fish heralds victory over his enemies. It is said A married woman preparing fish for her husband in a dream is a sign of stability in life between them and the end of any quarrel between them. A man buying a large amount of fish in a dream is one of the signs that this man will have many good offspring. Eating delicious fish expresses that this person has... He overcame the adversity, difficulties, and crises that he was going through. Read also: Seeing a fish in a dream for a man. Fishing in a dream for a married man. If the dreamer is not currently working, then fishing in a dream expresses that he will get a good job opportunity in the coming days. Fishing also represents The dream is that the dreamer is achieving many difficult goals and dreams that he was striving to achieve in the previous period. Perhaps fishing is good news for rest after distress and getting rid of the distress or sadness that he was experiencing. If this man is in debt, then fishing is an indication that the debts will expire and that they will be disposed of soon. Likewise, if a man is sick, fishing may be a sign of a speedy recovery from his illness. Interpretation of a dream about live fish for a married man: The large live fish that the man sees in a dream may indicate the multiplicity of means of livelihood that may appear before him. The large fish also indicates many happy moments Which comes this person's way. As for the small fish, it shows that this man missed many good opportunities in front of him. But if a living fish dies in front of a person, this indicates that this person is going through severe pain. Or the death of the fish could be a sign of the This person is in a financial crisis or has fallen into some debt. The appearance of a live fish without scales in a dream indicates the presence of many hypocritical liars in his social environment. I also invite you to learn about: Interpretation of dreams about fishing in a dream Buying fish in a dream for a married man Buying fish from a man expresses satisfaction That man about the life he lives. Also, seeing a married man buying fish indicates that this man will maintain the safety and stability of his wife and children. If this person seeks to travel abroad, then buying fish in a dream indicates that he will obtain the travel opportunity that he was looking for. About her. Also, seeing a man buying fish indicates that he will get a good promotion in his field of work. If the man buys a lot of fish, he may gain unexpected financial wealth in the coming days. Seeing raw fish in a dream Raw fish represents many pressures and responsibilities.

title: Interpretation of seeing a predator attack in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a predator attack in a dream via the website Vision roy2a.com. Seeing a predator attack in a dream has many meanings. Seeing it can be a good sign or an evil omen. Interpreters differed in the interpretation of seeing a predatory attack in a dream according to the visual situation and its circumstances and whether it is a single man or woman, married or pregnant. Today, through a vision website, we will discuss in detail the interpretation of seeing a predatory attack in a dream, based on the opinion of major interpreters such as Ibn Sirin and Ibn Kathir. Nabulsi and Imam Al-Sadiq, follow us. What is the interpretation of seeing a predatory attack in a dream according to Ibn Sirin? Seeing a predatory attack in a dream It indicates many enemies in the dreamer’s life and their evil in harming him. Seeing wild animals in a dream indicates the emergence of many problems and crises in the dreamer’s life. Seeing Killing a predatory animal in a dream states that the dreamer gets rid of all the difficulties and obstacles that the dreamer is going through in his life. You can also read an explanation: Interpretation of seeing the brain of an animal in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a predator attack in a dream for a single woman? Seeing a single woman being attacked by a predator in a dream. Saying She is going through a difficult period full of worries and sorrows in her life. Seeing a single woman raising a predatory animal in a dream shows that she will achieve all her goals and ambitions in life. You can also read an explanation: Interpretation of seeing feces from cats, animals, or mice in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing a predatory animal attack in a dream for a married woman Seeing a married woman being attacked by predatory animals in her home, but she fends them off in a dream, shows that something bad happened to her, but she will be able to overcome this problem with patience and strength. Seeing a married woman taming a predatory animal in a dream indicates many disagreements and problems between her and her husband, but she It will end soon. What is the interpretation of seeing a predatory animal attack in a dream for a pregnant woman? Seeing a predatory attack in a dream shows that she will face some health problems during pregnancy. A pregnant woman seeing monsters in a dream announces the death of her fetus, and God knows best. Seeing a pregnant woman killing a predatory animal in a dream says that she will soon undergo childbirth. You can also read an explanation: The interpretation of seeing a person running in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a predatory attack in a dream for a divorced woman? Seeing an absolute attack by predatory animals in a dream. It shows that unexpected things will happen in the near future. Seeing the final killing of a predatory animal in a dream. It indicates the end of the suffering that She is going through it in her life and the beginning of a new, happy and stable phase. Interpretation of a dream about animals for a single woman: Seeing a white cat in a dream announces that pleasant and happy things will happen to her in the next few days. Seeing one dog chasing her in a dream indicates the presence of an evil person in her life who is planning many tricks against her. Seeing one monkey In a dream, it indicates that someone who is not suitable for her and full of bad qualities will offer her marriage. Seeing a lonely, quiet child in a dream announces that she will marry a kind and caring young man. You can also read an explanation: Interpretation of seeing a tattoo in a dream.

title: Interpretation of a dream about an unmarried woman having a child according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Today we will talk about the interpretation of a dream of an unmarried woman having a child, and this vision is considered an abnormal vision, but it has many meanings and meanings that we will explain to you in detail. Interpretation of a dream of a single woman having a child An unmarried woman who has a child in a dream indicates that she will be able to achieve everything she loves and wants to achieve. An unmarried woman saw in her dream that she gave birth to a child. It is a sign that she will be able to marry the person she wants to marry. When an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she has a child, but this does not look good. Evidence that he will suffer severe distress in the coming seasons and God knows best. When an unmarried woman sees that she has a child in a dream, and this child cries a lot. This is evidence that he will fail to carry out a series of works and God knows best. If an unmarried woman dreams that she has a child, this is an expression that she carries a great concern that exceeds her ability to complete it. Seeing a single child giving birth to a child in a dream may indicate that you will be exposed to a great calamity in the coming period. Some interpreters believe that seeing an unmarried girl having a child in a dream. Expression of how bad her reputation is in the society in which she lives In it. Imam Al-Sadiq sees that an unmarried woman if she sees that she has a child in a dream. Evidence that she will be married to a handsome young man whom the girl loves and wants to marry. Imam Al-Nabulsi says that seeing an unmarried woman giving birth to a child in a dream may mean that she is old and has not yet married. If an unmarried woman sees a beautiful baby girl in her dream, this means that she will get married soon, God willing. You may be interested: Interpretation of a dream that I am breastfeeding a child who is not my son Interpretation of seeing an unmarried woman giving birth to a child in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that when an unmarried woman sees in a dream that she is giving birth to a child. Expressed that he will receive a wide livelihood in the next few days. This vision also expresses that we will be able to achieve our dreams after working hard to achieve them. Seeing a single child giving birth to a child in a dream also indicates. In many positive things that will happen to the girl. This vision also predicts the imminent marriage of this girl, and this is also in the event of her engagement. It can be evidence that a person is close to her and wants to marry her. If an unmarried woman sees that she has a child in a dream but she is a woman. This is evidence of That he will get rid of all the pains he is experiencing at that time. If he sees her in a dream giving birth to a child and it is a boy. This is evidence of her ability to solve her problems, whether they are problems related to her family. Or problems with her emotional life. This vision expresses good news that she will hear soon, God willing. If an unmarried woman sees a child and does not know him in her dream, this is a sign of the tremendous good that the girl will receive. Interpretation of seeing a child in a dream for a married woman A married woman who dreams of giving birth to a child, and he was always laughing at her. He does not know his parents, but he feels very afraid for him. This is evidence that she is always thinking about his children

title: Interpretation of a dream about a green snake for a married woman

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream of a green snake for a married woman Ibn Sirin believes that a married woman who sees a green snake and is sick can recover from her illness, God willing. But if the green snake tries to attack the owner of the dream, this is a warning sign for her that someone is chasing her and trying to harm her. If a married woman sees that the green snake is among the neighbors, it is a vision that shows that they are malicious and jealous of her. But if this woman works in trade, the appearance of the green snake mostly symbolizes the stagnation of her trade and the achievement of a lot of profits in it. The appearance of the green snake in the house of a married woman often indicates that there is someone trying to separate her from her husband. Some commentators believe that the appearance of the green snake in the house of a married woman indicates that this woman is exposed to severe envy. If a married woman sees a dead green snake in her bed, she can divorce her husband. Or perhaps the appearance of the dead snake is the result of this woman’s instability and insecurity in her married life. The interpretation of a dream of a green snake for a married woman can be one of the signs of abundance in earning a livelihood for that woman. And do not forget to read our article on: Interpretation of a dream of a green snake Interpretation of a dream The big green snake The appearance of a big green snake in a married woman indicates the presence of a deceitful and lying person in her social environment. But if a married woman sees that the husband is carrying a big green snake, it usually shows that the husband has done a lot for her. She is trying to please her. Interpretation of a dream about a green snake and killing it If a married woman sees herself killing a big green snake, a sick friend in her social circle may avoid her. However, some commentators believe that killing a green snake indicates that the husband is facing a difficult problem and that he may need his wife to stand by him. If this woman is facing a difficult problem at the moment, killing a green snake indicates that she will soon get out of this problem. But if this woman is suffering from debts and financial problems, killing a green snake portends her. The financial situation will improve soon. A dream about a green snake for a pregnant woman in a dream The appearance of a green snake in a pregnant woman's dream can be good news of pregnancy with a male child, God willing. The appearance of a big green snake in a pregnant woman's dream, but it stands at a distance, indicates the ease of childbirth that this woman will go through. Ibn Sirin also confirms that The green snake in a dream often symbolizes goodness and the abundance of sustenance that comes to him. The green snake in a pregnant woman’s dream can be a sign that she has a healthy child. And it is good news for her that he will be a righteous son. But if the pregnant woman feels afraid of the green snake that appears to her, she will go through many worries, problems and sorrows. If the color of the green snake turns into a black snake in a dream, this lady will be betrayed and treachery by someone close to her. As for the bite of the green snake, it indicates that she will hear bad news very soon. A dream of a green snake biting a person’s leg in a dream In the event of a bite

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing drinking water for a fasting person in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of drinking water for a fasting person in a dream? Seeing breakfast during the day in Ramadan, and it was after the Maghrib prayer, is one of the promising visions of goodness, livelihood and abundant blessings. Seeing fasting and breaking the fast outside of fasting is evidence that the dreamer has committed many abominations and sins. Seeing eternal fasting in a dream also indicates goodness, happiness and closeness to Almighty God. Dreaming of fasting for more than a month is one of the praiseworthy visions and a sign of repentance and freedom from worries and problems. Seeing someone drinking water by mistake in a dream is evidence that the dreamer will gain many benefits and benefits in his coming days. Seeing a fasting person drinking water during the day in Ramadan indicates the difficulties and dangers that the dreamer will face. Interpretation of a dream of breaking the fast intentionally during the day in Ramadan Intentional breaking the fast during the day in Ramadan in a dream is considered one of the undesirable dreams that do not bode well at all. Seeing the fortune teller's breakfast intentionally in one's dream is a sign that one is going through some problems and troubles in his current life. Interpretation of seeing breakfast with someone intentionally in a dream is one of the visions that indicate some sins And mistakes. Bathing in a dream See all the opinions contained in the dream books of interpreters of seeing a bathroom in a dream for a single married person. Seeing a bathroom in a dream Seeing a bathroom in a dream has many connotations, it can indicate a woman and intercourse, because a bathroom must take off his clothes. Bathing in a dream can indicate To money, because water flows in it, and bathing can indicate imprisonment. Perhaps a dove in a dream means a gathering of people in evil or evil, and a dove shows weakness. Seeing a dove in the dark or a very hot bath is a sign of the companions of hellfire or the companions of evil. Seeing death In the bathroom is not good as it indicates hell, God forbid, and falling into the bathroom means distress. Seeing him sitting in the bathroom could mean that whoever does that will blow up a woman. As for seeing building a bathroom in a dream, it may indicate that you are committing an immoral act, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of dreams for entering and exiting the bathroom. Cleaning the toilet in a dream. Bathing in a dream. Interpretation of the bathroom in a dream for a poor person shows him wealth and abundance of livelihood for him as well as healing the sick. The interpretation of seeing a dove in a dream could be a sign of marriage or it could indicate repentance, and perhaps paying off debts, and each interpretation is according to For the dream. Seeing men with women in the bathroom is a sign that the fortuneteller is suspicious, and perhaps a sign of heresies. Seeing staying in the bathroom or remaining in it is an indication that the dreamer will continue to commit sins and remain in them. The darkness of the bathroom shows a prison, and the bathroom filled with blood shows profit that comes from forbidden matters. Interpretation of a dream about entering the bathroom. Entering the bathroom in a dream is a sign of rest and comfort, especially for one who comforts himself. Entering the bathroom in a dream for a patient with a fever and leaving him in a cold atmosphere in the dream indicates his recovery, and God knows best. Entering the bathroom in a dream for someone who is not suffering from an illness may indicate To have a crisis, but in a dispute. And seeing the entrance to the bathroom outside the house in any place indicates the dreamer’s help with other people. And the priest who enters the bathroom under duress indicates that he will marry him and is forced to do so. I read about that: Interpretation of the dream of entering the bathroom with someone. Interpretation of the dream of bathing. Vision A dove in a dream for a married woman: Seeing a dove in a dream for a married woman has many connotations and the interpretation is according to the same vision. Seeing a dove in a dream for a husband indicates his attempt to find a safe solution to a problem or a difficult problem and solve it. One of his children entering the bathroom in a dream indicates his search for a solution to a problem in which he is involved. Seeing a bathroom in a dream for a married woman, and it was a market bathroom or a public bathroom, because it indicates places of entertainment or chaos. Interpretation of a dream about sleeping in a bathroom. Interpretation of a dream about sleeping in a bathroom indicates that the dreamer is committing wrongdoing, and God knows best. Perhaps the interpretation of a dream about sleeping in a bathroom indicates imprisonment. If the bathroom is wide, this may indicate weakness. Seeing a mother-in-law

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing rubber in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about seeing rubber in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Rubber is one of the materials that people use in abundance in their lives, as it is used in the manufacture of various clothes. It is also used in the manufacture of corsets, which have many uses for people because of the flexibility of rubber and its ability to form what is made of it, but what does it mean? That is in a dream. In this article, we present to you the interpretation of a dream about seeing rubber in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing rubber in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin. Despite the importance of rubber and its multiple uses that bring benefits and benefits to humanity, seeing it in a dream can bring goodness to the visionary and can cause harm. In the future life of the pioneer, this is different from the one dream in the world. Another, here we explain to you the interpretation of the dream of seeing rubber in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Rubber in a businessman’s dream indicates the emergence of a business that will lead to unfavorable changes. While wearing rubber clothes in a dream means the pioneer’s noble morals and his fragrant conduct among neighbors and people. While seeing The body is full of rubber clothes in a dream. This is considered a warning and a warning to the dreamer, as someone is talking bad things about him. But wearing rubber in a dream indicates that the dreamer has a good and simple personality. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing pebbles and stones by the most famous interpreters in detail. Interpretation of a dream about steak In a dream, there are many uses for a chopstick in life, as it is used in many fields. The ability to make it in different lengths and sizes has helped, in addition to the ability to add dyes to it. Seeing a chopstick in a dream is a good vision, as it indicates relief from stress, and the end of distress. As well as overcoming many problems and obstacles. While seeing a steak in a dream shows the dreamer’s ability to overcome problems and difficulties in his life. While seeing an eraser in a dream indicates that the past has been forgotten and forgotten, it is also a sign of new beginnings. See also: Interpretation The dream of seeing a party in a dream in detail. Interpretation of the dream of seeing rubber bracelets in a dream. The bracelet or bangle in a woman’s dream is generally considered a good vision and has many good connotations for her because it indicates her marriage to a good man and it may be an indication of pleasure and blessings on her hand, but for men it is like that. It is considered a bad vision because it indicates restrictions, imprisonment, and adversity. As for the interpretation of a dream about seeing rubber bracelets in a dream, when a person sees rubber products in a dream, its interpretation is that there are secrets that the dreamer is trying to hide from everyone. While seeing a rubber suit indicates the high status of the pioneer. While seeing Rubber in a dream, if the dreamer is a merchant, then this is a sign of profit in trade. Rubber also indicates the demand for an investment project during the next period of the dreamer’s life. But if he sees that his hands have become similar to rubber, this indicates that he is afflicted with illness. But seeing the use of rubber In the dream, it indicates that the dreamer is...

title: Interpretation of a dream about the buttocks and seeing the anus in a dream

preview.html: Anus: Enlarged buttocks in a dream. Buttocks in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my big butt. Touching the back in a dream. Inserting a finger into the anus in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a big butt in a dream. Returning to marriage for single people. The back: indicates the advantages of its owner and his places of comfort. If it is blocked, cut, or affected, he will die if he is sick, otherwise he will suffer pain. Even though it breaks it shows that his repentance. If a fire, worms, or itching occurs in it, this is evidence of a bad disease. And God forbid. Likewise, if it falls on a woman’s vagina, it is an indication of immorality, and for whom is her torment apparent. The author said: They looked at the anus and the vagina. As one of them said to me: I saw that I fell into a man’s anus, so I said: You are falling into a resting place. Likewise, another said: I said: We fear that you will have anal intercourse. Another said: I saw my back was blocked, so I said: Your toilet drain is blocked. Another said: I saw that I was eating from the anus, so I said: Your life is from the toilets. Likewise, another said: I said: I took a bead from a well and sold it and ate its price. The anus of a man in a dream indicates the wife’s money. If he sees it as large, then his wife has a lot of money. And whoever sees his back large in a dream, this means that the dreamer will win with his wife’s money and experience joy and happiness. If a person sees another person in a dream, this means that he has lost his way and lost his life. As for one who exposes his back In a dream, whether actually or in person, this indicates that his matter will be revealed. Whoever dreams that he is getting married behind her back in a dream indicates that he is requesting the matter in another way, or that he is performing an act that will not benefit him. Walking and crawling in the anus in a dream indicates that the dreamer He may be forced or incompetent. As for someone who sees that his anus is blocked in a dream and is unable to expel his feces or wind, the tiger indicates a miserable life and there may be submission and humiliation. As for someone who dreams of a blockage in the anus and he is indifferent to it, then this It indicates keeping secrets. Eating or drinking from the anus in a dream is a disease. Worms coming out of the anus in a dream may indicate the approaching term. The blood that comes out of the anus in a dream indicates grandchildren and may also indicate the separation of some parents. And staining. With blood coming out of the anus in a dream, it could indicate prohibited money. A bird or animal coming out of a person’s anus is an indication of a newborn, depending on the gender of the animal or bird. As for seeing the mother’s anus in a dream, this may indicate a lack of earning due to sins. And disobedience. And the man saw as if the woman’s impotence had descended from heaven to earth, so he related his vision in a surah, and said: What are you? title: Interpretation of seeing incense in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing incense in a dream. Many consider dreams a part of their daily lives and often think about what happens in dreams and want to search for explanations and meanings for what they see in a dream, although science has proven that dreams are ideas that the subconscious mind stores after repeating them in the conscious mind. , because of events or ideas that one can see often, so in this article today we will learn about the interpretation of seeing incense in a dream.Interpretation of seeing incenseIf an unmarried girl sees that she is lighting incense in her dream, and she loves incense and its smell in reality, this expresses the coming good news. To her, and the news will be happy based on the smell of incense in a dream. Seeing an unmarried girl in her dream lighting incense. This indicates that this girl is good and has decent morals. If an unmarried girl sees the presence of some people in her dream and they admire the smell of incense. This symbolizes that he will be able to achieve all his goals soon. Incense in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates her good luck and that she will soon marry a good man with whom she will be happy. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is inhaling incense. This expresses the girl’s satisfaction and quality of life.Interpretation of seeing incense. Interpretation of Fahd Al-OsaimiFahd Al-Osaimi for dream interpreters. The following can be seen in the interpretation of a dream about incense: The smell of incense in a dream indicates that happy news will soon come to the dreamer. Seeing evaporation indicates the healing of the sick person and the removal of magic. Incense in a dream symbolizes the end of the quarrels present in one of the dreamer’s relationships, and it also indicates the return of the absent person. If the sinner is far from the Almighty, God sees incense in a dream. This indicates his guidance, commitment, and return to God. If he sees incense in his dream, he is hiding a secret. This means revealing the dreamer's secret in one way or another. Seeing incense in an unmarried girl's dream indicates future success and good luck. Also, seeing incense represents healing for a person in the event of illness and suffering from witchcraft. If a girl sees in her dream that she is inhaling incense and is satisfied with its smell. This symbolizes the upcoming good news that she is expecting. Seeing an unmarried girl buying incense means that she will marry a virtuous and righteous man. If one sees in a dream that incense is coming out of another incense burner; This indicates that the dreamer will be blessed with good offspring. Seeing a person in a dream carrying an incense stick. It refers to dreams that the dreamer is trying to achieve.If in a dream a person smokes himself or is smoked by someone else. This indicates that the dreamer has a good reputation and decent morals. For a pregnant woman to dream of wearing incense symbolizes the birth of a male child who will be her good offspring. If the pregnant woman finds herself enjoying the smell of incense, is it permissible for her to do so? This means getting rid of all the pain and problems associated with pregnancy. Seeing a house filled with incense in a dream for a pregnant woman means that she will give birth soon. Interpretation of seeing incense, interpretation by Ibn SirinIbn Sirin is one of the most important and prominent imams of dream interpretation. He saw incense and said the following: Seeing incense in the...
